title: surface_water_flow_from_adjacent_corn_field
summary: Observation of surface water flowing from an adjacent corn field into a lower area near the farm.
description: An image-based record documenting visible surface water flowing from a neighboring corn field into a lower channel near the farm boundary. At the time of capture, the main canal contained no standing water. No interpretation applied.

event.status: active flow at time of capture

reference_context.note: This record documents external surface runoff while the canal was observed to have no water.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
